DOCNAME: CASE OF IVANOVSKI AND OTHERS v. "THE FORMER YOUGOSLAV REPUBLIC OF MACEDONIA"
CONCLUSION: Violation of Article 6 - Right to a fair trial
JUDGES: Karel Jungwiert;Mark Villiger;Mirjana Lazarova Trajkovska;Peer Lorenzen;Rait Maruste;Renate Jaeger;Zdravka Kalaydjieva
TEXT: CARDINAL . NORP In DATE the applicants concluded a sales contract with CARDINAL individuals buying shares from the A. company ( “ the company ” ) .

CARDINAL . On DATE the first applicant brought a civil action requesting ORG ( “ the first - instance court ” ) to order the company to register the sales contracts in its book of shareholders and to provide them with a certificate of title . On DATE the second applicant and Mr PERSON joined the first applicant 's claim . During the proceedings , the applicants specified their claim on CARDINAL occasions .
CARDINAL . DATE and DATE , the first - instance court ordered CARDINAL adjournments , none of which was requested by the applicants .

CARDINAL . On DATE the first - instance court dismissed the applicants ' claim finding that they had failed to comply with the applicable legislation and that the company had not had a capacity to stand in the proceedings . It also dismissed their request of CARDINAL DATE for an interim measure prohibiting the vendors to dispose of the shares .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG partly upheld the applicants ' appeal of DATE and remitted the case for a renewed examination .
CARDINAL . On DATE the first - instance court dismissed the applicants ' claim . The decision was served on them on DATE .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG dismissed the applicants ' appeal . They were served with the decision on DATE .
